title: MakeMyTrip | Lead Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B-Tech in Computer Science from Tier 1 University
Years of Experience: 7.5
Prior Experience: Product based company in travel domain.
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: MakeMyTrip
Title/Level: Lead Software Engineer
Location: Banglore
Salary: INR 40,50,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: INR 10,00,000 stock grant vested equally over 4 years.
Bonus: INR 4,50,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 47,50,000
Benefits: Standard MMT Benefits
Other details: Inclined towards declining the offer as I think I'm being low balled and recruiter isn't allowing any further negotiation.

title: Offer Evaluation | Google | L3 | Bangalore | Need Help
content:
Education: B.tech in ECE from Tier-1 IIT
Years of Experience: 3 yrs
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: (SDE-1) L3
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: ₹23,00,000
Bonus: 15% of base salary
Stock: $53k stock grant vested over 4 years
Signing Bonus: ₹1,00,000
Benefits: Standard Google benefits

---------------------------------------------------------
Current Company :- A big MNC
Annual base salary :- 22 LPA
Annual CTC :- 29 LPA

title: Microsoft | L62 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Pvt Tier-2
Years of Experience: 3 years 8 months, 2020 grad (previously interned - 6 months with Microsoft & 2 years with MS Research)
Current CTC: I'm in Singapore, base is 60K SGD - on the lower side because I'm pursuing part-time PhD
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Microsoft IDC (R&D)
Title/Level: Data Scientist 2
Location: Bangalore
Base: 32L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: (3.2L + 2L) = 5.2L
Stock bonus: 50K USD
Perf Bonus: 20%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):
1st year - (32L + 3.2L+ 1L + 10L stocks + performance) = 46.2L
2nd year - (32L + 1L + 10L stocks + performance) = 43L
Benefits: Standard Benefits

Seems like they've low-labelled hard. I have requested revision but without a competing offer seems difficult.
